column1: Melilot was the daughter of [[Marmadas Brandybuck]].<ref>{{App
column2: Brandybuck}}</ref> She was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party
column4: 1401}}, when she was just sixteen years old. The only part she played in the great events of that time was to dance the [[springle-ring]] at the party with [[Everard Took]].<ref>{{FR

column2: Melilot]]'', or Sweet Clover, is a grassland plant. The name derives from Greek ''μελίλωτος'' "honey lotus".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"; see also {{LB

'''2001-2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'':'''
